skins.name: Dr. Junkenstein
skins.description: As the tale goes, Dr. Junkenstein made a deal with the Witch of the Wilds in exchange for the secret to creating life. But his triumph was short lived as he was slain by four wanderers in Adlersbrunn.

skins.name: Witch
skins.description: The Witch of the Wilds is a mysterious figure who appears in the tale of Dr. Junkenstein and others, offering people the object of their desire, for a price.

skins.name: Pumpkin
skins.description: In the tale of Dr. Junkenstein, the Reaper was a servant to the Witch of the Wilds, bound to serve her for some unknown reason.

skins.name: Junkenstein's Monster

skins.name: Viking

voicelines.name: It's a giving time of year
Today, I give you a choice
I Made That Just for You
Did you bring me a present?
Go on... give it a shake!
Swap these out for ice skates
I could use the time off
Can't I guide your way tonight
I have your present right here
Who wants to buy me a present

skins.name: Lieutenant Wilhelm
skins.description: Lieutenant Reinhardt Wilhelm served with distinction in his time during Overwatch, notably leading the strike team that ended the King's Row uprising.

skins.description: Unlocked by participating in the Archives 2020 week 1 challenge

skins.description: Unlocked by participating in the Archives 2020 week 2 challenge

skins.name: Sniper
skins.description: During the Omnic Crisis, the Egyptian military outfitted their elite snipers, including Ana Amari, with cybernetic ocular implants, greatly improving their efficiency in the defense of their country.

skins.name: Socialite
skins.description: As the daughter of socialites, Ashe feels just as comfortable at charity balls as she does on a motorcycle.

skins.name: Talon
skins.description: After his service in the Caribbean Coalition was complete, Baptiste struggled to find a demand for his unique skills. Talon was more than happy to help.

skins.name: Gwishin
skins.description: The Gwishin omnic colossus rose from the omnium in the East China Sea. The Mobile Exo-Force of the Korean Army, or MEKA, was formed in response to the Gwishin's constant attacks.

skins.name: Talon
skins.description: Doomfist rose in power in Talon after killing his mentor, Akinjide Adeyemi, the Scourge of Numbani.

skins.name: Blackwatch
skins.description: After agreeing to aid the organization, Genji was upgraded extensively by Overwatch's cyberneticists.

skins.name: Scion
skins.description: Over the centuries, the Shimada clan grew to profit from a lucrative trade in arms and other illegal substances.

skins.name: King Jamison
skins.description: After escaping from the Australian Outback, Junkrat and Roadhog went on an international crime spree, earning them great notoriety across the world, and living up to their motto of, “No job too big, no score too small!”

skins.name: Blackwatch
skins.description: A young Jesse McCree was recruited into Blackwatch after Gabriel Reyes saw his potential and gave him a choice: join Blackwatch or rot in prison.

skins.name: Deadlock
skins.description: In their younger days, Jesse McCree and Elizabeth "Calamity" Ashe co-founded the Deadlock Gang.

skins.name: Pajamei
skins.description: Due to a malfunction of Ecopoint: Antarctica's cryogenics facility, Mei was kept in hibernation for almost a decade and woke up to find a new, unfamiliar world.

skins.name: Combat Medic Ziegler
skins.description: When called upon, Mercy would don her Valkyrie swift-response suit to participate in Overwatch missions.

skins.name: Blackwatch
skins.description: In addition to her research as a part of Blackwatch, Moira occasionally participated in clandestine operations, including the Venice Incident.

skins.name: Scientist
skins.description: To this day, Dr. O'Deorain remains a controversial figure in genetic research. Her brilliance was never in question; her ethics, almost always.

skins.name: Null Sector
skins.description: During the King's Row Uprising, Null Sector employed redesigned and upgraded OR14 Idina bots to secure the power station.

skins.name: Aviator
skins.description: Lieutenant Fareeha “Pharah” Amari was hand-picked by Helix after her meritorious career in the Egyptian armed forces. Bearing the famous Amari family name, she was considered a recruitment coup.

skins.name: Soldier: 24
skins.description: Before serving on the original Overwatch strike team, Gabriel Reyes was selected to be a member of the government's classified soldier enhancement program.

skins.name: Militia
skins.description: After the Australian government displaced Mako Rutledge and other residents of the Outback from their homes, they turned to violent rebellion, forming the Australian Liberation Front.

skins.name: Formal: 76
skins.description: During his service in Overwatch, Jack Morrison received many commendations for his leadership.

skins.name: Talon
skins.description: Sombra is only too happy to utilize the power and reach of Talon while pursuing her own goals.

skins.name: Chief Engineer Lindholm
skins.description: For many years, Torbjörn Lindholm served as Overwatch's chief engineer, designing many of the organization's iconic weapons and technologies.

skins.name: Ironclad
skins.description: Torbjörn was a prominent member of the Ironclad Guild, whose headquarters were in Gothenburg, Sweden.

skins.name: Cadet Oxton
skins.description: Tracer was put into active duty as an Overwatch agent for the first time during the King's Row uprising.

skins.name: Specimen 28
skins.description: The gorilla known as Specimen 28 showed rapid brain development from genetic therapy, surpassing that of the other subjects.

voicelines.name: It never gets fast enough for me
A chicken out of a feather
If you make your bed, lie in it
Time to roll up my sleeves
I didn't ask for your opinion
I know you can do better
My fate is written in blood
Turn it up in my headphones
That went against my better nature
I was only trying to help
I live for a good fight
Reality is rarely what it seems
I'd love to stay and chat

skins.name: Shieldmaiden
skins.description: A prominent figure in her own legends, the Shieldmaiden is also known as the Viking's daughter in the tale of Junkenstein.

skins.name: Academy
skins.description: While she was in high school, Hana "D.Va" Song held the #1 rank in Mecha Guardian V and won the world championship, surpassing her teammate, Yuna "D.mon" Lee, and her biggest rival, Kyung-soo "King" Han.

skins.name: Formal
skins.description: As the heir to his family's prosthetic-technology company, Doomfist was no stranger to the finer things in life.

skins.name: Sherlock
skins.description: "My mind," he said, "rebels at stagnation. Give me problems, give me work, give me the most abstruse cryptogram or the most intricate analysis, and I am in my proper atmosphere."

skins.name: Masquerade
skins.description: “There are chords in the hearts of the most reckless which cannot be touched without emotion, even by the utterly lost, to whom life and death are equally jests, there are matters of which no jest can be made.”

skins.name: Cybjörn
skins.description: "...like the terrible culmination of a thousand of my worst nightmares. Are you kidding me?"
